column1: 8.1	  Summary of evidence and recommendations for the follow-up of UTUC
Perform cystoscopy at three months. If negative, perform subsequent cystoscopy 9 months   Weak  later and then yearly, for 5 years.

Perform cystoscopy and urinary cytology at 3 months. If negative, repeat subsequent   cystoscopy and cytology every 3 months for a period of 2 years, and every 6 months   thereafter until 5 years, and then yearly.
Perform computed tomography (CT) urography and chest CT every 6 months for 2 years,   and then yearly.
Perform cystoscopy and CT urography at 3 and 6 months, and then yearly for 5 years.  Weak
Perform ureteroscopy (URS) at 3 months if no second-look ureteroscopy was performed.  Weak
Perform URS and urinary cytology in situ at 3 and 6 months.   Weak
